name: Bunburrow
description: A small, brown fox-like monster that burrows underground. Its ears are tipped with tufts of pink fairy dust. Known for its protective nature and supportive abilities.

ability.name: Pixilate
ability.description: Normal-type moves become Fairy-type and gain a 20% power boost

moves.name: Fairy Wind
moves.description: The user stirs up a fairy wind and strikes the opponent with it.

moves.name: Heal Bell
moves.description: The user makes a soothing bell chime to heal the status conditions of all allies.

moves.name: Light Screen
moves.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from special attacks for five turns.

moves.name: Burrow Strike
moves.description: The user burrows underground and strikes with a surprise attack. Always goes first on the turn it's used.
